doc:
Alexander Godunov https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alexander_Godunov 0 Alexander Borisovich Godunov (Russian: Александр Борисович Годунов; November 28, 1949 – May 18, 1995) was a Russian-American ballet dancer and film actor. He was a member of the Bolshoi Ballet and became the troupe's Premier danseur. In 1979, he defected to the United States. Soviet overseers for the troupe immediately put his wife on a flight back to the Soviet Union. Initially the United States did not allow the flight to leave, resulting in a diplomatic incident between the two nations. Alexander_Borisovich_Godunov ( Russian : Александр_Борисович_Годунов ; November_28_,_1949 – May_18_,_1995 ) was a_Russian-American_ballet_dancer_and_film_actor . He was a_member of the_Bolshoi_Ballet and became the_troupe 's_Premier_danseur . In 1979 , he defected to the_United_States . Soviet_overseers for the_troupe immediately put his_wife on a_flight back to the_Soviet_Union . Initially the_United_States did_not_allow the_flight to_leave , resulting in a_diplomatic_incident between the_two_nations .
